LanguageData.ARA_CreepyCrawly.degreeDatas.0.label: arthropod
LanguageData.ARA_CreepyCrawly.degreeDatas.0.descripti: {PAWN_nameDef} are gigantic arthropods whose numerous appendages, mirror-like exoskeletons, and undulating, segmented bodies are enough to evoke deep fear in humans.\n\nWell, you don't really think of them as beautiful girls, do you?
LanguageData.ARA_Queen_Main_Trait.degreeDatas.0.label: I am a swarm of insects
LanguageData.ARA_Queen_Main_Trait.degreeDatas.0.descr: {PAWN_nameDef} is the only individual in the Arachne swarm that can produce supervisor insects, and as a being at the top of the hive mind, she has the great mission of guiding the Arachne swarm.\n\nShe controls the autonomous consciousness of most of the insect swarm. The insects under her control no longer feel sadness or fear, and become a mighty army of flesh and blood - but when she causes a mental breakdown, that breakdown is transmitted to all of her offspring through the hive network!
